name: Thinktag Giveaway
author: wp-thinktag

sections.description:
A simple, secure and effortless way to host giveaways on your WordPress blog or website and download your email list.

Prerequisites

  • You are a blogger
  • Free signup to the http://thinktag.co.uk blogger console

Features

  • Create your giveaway in 5 mins
  • Automated winner selection
  • Secure access to console to download participant and winners

See how it works

Arbitrary section

You need to signup for free to the thinktag console https://thinktag.co.uk/secure/signup.html

Documentation

You tube video
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xDB-k1l04kA
sections.installation:
1. Upload the entire ‘mygiveaway’ folder to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin using ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Add the short code to your page or post
sections.faq:
Email support

When you are logged in to the thinktag console, you can raise support tickets or email me

Do you provide some extra “premium” customization ?

Not for the moment, you can email me if you have any custom requirements.

short_description: An Easy and secure way to host giveaways on your WordPress blog or website. The plugin requires free signup to the thinktag.co.uk console.
